Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to all damage and effects on miss or successful save. Resistant to damage from non-attack spaces of area effects.

Traits.Name: Prowl
Traits.Description: Gains stealth at the start of their turn.

Traits.Name: Finishing Blow
Traits.Description: Boost damage if character is bloodied.

Actions.Name: Strafe Shot
Actions.Hit: Deal light damage. Can interrupt movement.

Actions.Name: Pepper
Actions.Description: Deal piercing fray damage to a character in range 5.
